---
title: "data_generator"
format: html
---

```{r}
scout_initials = sample(c("NS","HR"), size=201, replace=TRUE)
match_number = floor(seq(from=4,to=204)/4)
team_number = sample(c(100:1000), size=201, replace=TRUE)
starting_position = sample(c("I","O"), size=201, replace=TRUE)
no_show = sample(c(TRUE,FALSE), size=201, replace=TRUE, prob=c(1,99))
auto_lunites_missed = sample(c(0:3), size=201, replace=TRUE, prob=c(2,1,1,2))
auto_lunites_high = sample(c(0:3), size=201, replace=TRUE, prob=c(4:1))
auto_lunites_low = sample(c(0:6), size=201, replace=TRUE, prob=c(7:1))
moved = sample(c(TRUE,FALSE), size=201, replace=TRUE, prob=c(9,1))
ground_intake_auto = sample(c(TRUE,FALSE), size=201, replace=TRUE, prob=c(1,9))
teleop_preshutdown_high_lunites_scored = sample(c(0:10), size=201, replace=TRUE, prob=c(1,2,3,4,5,6,5,4,3,2,1))
teleop_preshutdown_low_lunites_scored = sample(c(0:7), size=201, replace=TRUE, prob=c(1,2,3,4,4,3,2,1))
teleop_preshutdown_lunites_missed = sample(c(0:5), size=201, replace=TRUE, prob=c(1,2,3,3,2,1))
teleop_preshutdown_lunites_passed = sample(c(0:5), size=201, replace=TRUE, prob=c(1,2,3,3,2,1))
end_position=sample(c("none","park","linked"),size=201,replace=TRUE,prob=c(3:1))
bunnies_inside=sample(c(0:3),size=201,replace=TRUE,prob=c(0:3))
tele_op_ground_intake=sample(c(TRUE,FALSE),size=201,replace=TRUE,prob=c(1,9))
general_comments=sample(c("played_defense","inconsistent_shooting","inconsistent_intake","poor_CG",""),size=201,replace=TRUE,prob=c(20,1,1,1,20))
defense_fouls=ifelse(general_comments=="played_defense", sample(c(0:4),size=201,replace=TRUE,prob=c(5:1)), 0)
defense_rating=ifelse(general_comments=="played_defense", sample(c(0:5),size=201,replace=TRUE,prob=2 ^ c(6:1)), 0)
post_high_lunites_scored=sample(c(0:7),size=201,replace=TRUE,prob=c(1,2,3,4,4,3,2,1))
post_low_lunites_scored=sample(c(0:9),size=201,replace=TRUE,prob=c(1,2,3,4,5,5,4,3,2,1))
post_lunites_missed=sample(c(0:5),size=201,replace=TRUE,prob=c(1,2,3,3,2,1))
post_lunites_passed=sample(c(0:10),size=201,replace=TRUE,prob=c(1,2,3,4,5,6,5,4,3,2,1))






postmatch_driver_ranking = sample(c(1:5), size=201, replace=TRUE)
postmatch_difficulties = sample(c(NA,"ls","ba","di","de","t"), size=201, replace=TRUE, prob=c(5,1,1,1,1,1))
```
